value.title: From Decomposition Tree to Details in Power BI!!!
value.excerpt: The Decomposition Tree is an amazing visual but how can we get to the details. Where's my drill through? Patrick walks you through how you can set this up in Power BI Desktop! value.title: Building relationships between tables when both have duplicates
value.excerpt: PowerPivot and Power BI Desktop only allow the creation of relationships between tables when one of columns forming the relationship does not have duplicate values.
